ygData.subject: Re: End The !@#%ing OOCs
ygData.msgSnippet: Last OOC from me: The last OOC comment I made was the DBZ thing when I first saw the goku thing... then when I saw rauq say no I worshipped him... ::Holds up

Last OOC from me: The last OOC comment I made was the DBZ thing when 
I first saw the goku thing... then when I saw rauq say no I 
worshipped him... ::Holds up mighty Rauq action figure complete with 
kneecap busting bat::

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> THAT IS ENOUGH!
> 
> Out of the last 100+ posts, barely _10_ of them were IC. This is an 
RPG board, not a general discussion board. If you want to discus 
something, do it over private email or on the message board on the 
site.
> 
> I don't know about other people, but I am sick as hell of the 
completely pointless OOCs on the RPG board. Lurker, you're a great 
RPer. Now shut up and take the compliment. Dewey, this is a BW RPG. 
The moment I see a char with even a variation of "Goku" as his name, 
you'll regret it. In adition, stop moding. You can't make other 
people's chars do things, you never posted for Mustex even attempting 
to get on Alliance Island, much less getting on it, you have no part 
in the past of NBW, and can't change it at will. Your chars have no 
logical way of knowing about Zardus or Veratis, and its moding to 
have them have that insight. Either explain how they know or drop 
that storyline. It makes no sence. Also, you never even landed that 
lowlife seller or whatever of yours on the planet, and I'm not going 
to write your profiles for you. Shape up. Read the rules and act by 
them. LegendaryNemasis, please stop commenting on every post. The 
council will catch it if its moding.
> 
> Everyone else: stop the OOCs. Either write RPG posts, or don't post 
at all. I'm very sick of coming home from work and reading through 
100 or so damn OOC posts. I'm about ready to moderate anyone who 
sends an OOC ever again. I won't, but keep in mind that I'm on the 
verge of turning into a very mean person.
> 
> From now on, use private email for pointless OOCs, or use the 
site's message board. DO NOT clog up space on this board. I'm sick of 
it, as I said like 10 times already in this post.
> 
> There. I'm through with my ranting. I really hope the OOC messages 
stop. Its very hard for me to keep up with posts as it is, and all 
this pointless crap is starting to convince me not to even bother.
